option.od: print the help message and exit.
filenames of the fit format files.
files are in the fitacf format.
filename of the fitacf format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.
files are in the cfit format.
filenames of the cfit format files.

synopsis.p: Extract information (metadata) from fit, fitacf or cfit format files.

description.p: Extract information (metadata) from fit, fitacf or cfit format files.
The extracted information is written to standard output.

example.description: Extract information from the fit file "20040830.gbr.fit" and store it in the file "20040830.gbr.info".
Extract information from the fitacf file "20040830.gbr.fitacf" and store it in the file "20040830.gbr.info".
